title: ‘Democracy Is on the Ballot,’ Biden Says Ahead of Midterm Elections
description: President Biden said that democracy was being threatened by Republicans who said they wouldn’t commit to accepting the results of the coming midterm elections.
dc:creator: The New York Times

media:content.media:credit: Pete Marovich for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: President Biden urged Americans to reject political violence and voter intimidation in his speech on Wednesday.
